description: X509 certificate data used to sign the document's data based on the XML-DSIG standard: http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/#sec-X509Data

issuer_name.description: The issuer name or description that complies with section 3 of RFC4514.

serial_number.description: The serial number of the certificate.

ski.description: Base64 encoded plain (i.e. non-DER-encoded) value of a X509 V.3 SubjectKeyIdentifier extension.

certificate.description: Base64 encoded string of the X509 certificate used to sign the payload.

crl.description: Contains a base64-encoded certificate revocation list.
